## Description

This PR adds a new recipe for **CircleSeeker**, a comprehensive bioinformatics pipeline for detection, classification, and characterization of extrachromosomal circular DNA \(eccDNA\) from PacBio HiFi long-read sequencing data.

## Features

- **Dual-engine support**: Cresil \(preferred\) and Cyrcular \(fallback\) with intelligent auto-selection
- **Comprehensive eccDNA classification**: UeccDNA, MeccDNA, CeccDNA, XeccDNA
- **16-step automated pipeline** with checkpoint and resumption capabilities
- **Detailed HTML reports** and comprehensive output formats \(CSV, BED, BEDPE, FASTA\)

## Links

- **Homepage**: https://github.com/leoxqy/CircleSeeker
